instance_id.description: The unique identifier for an instance of the shipping method.

title.description: Title of the shipping method zone.

order.description: Specifies the order in which the shipping method appears.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the shipping method is enabled or disabled.

method_id.description: The ID of the shipping method.

method_title.description: The title of the shipping method.

settings.description: Additional settings or configurations for the shipping method.
